chapters.title: Chapter 7: Pitfalls and Tripwires
chapters.info: Lady Arymilla Marne, p. 154 (186)—Brown-eyed Andoran noble with a habit of fainting. She opposed Morgase during the Succession. The only real reason Rand kept her around in Caemlyn was to push others into supporting Dyelin; no one wanted Andor in the hands of Arymilla.
